name: Squaretro
description:
Squaretro is an arcade style death-maze puzzle game with a minimalist look that brings intensely challenging gameplay for those who like to push their reflexes to the limit, featuring levels and an endless mode that tests a player's skills and endurance. 

Play in the colourful and retro-esque aesthetic, and watch out of surprises! 
Are you ready to face the difficulty, again, and again?

Caution: Carpal Tunnel/Sore Hands Risk
PHOTOSENSITIVE WARNING:  Bright/Flashing lights

Credits 
Game Director - Jun Wei
Lead Dev - Sean Lee
Media Supervisor - Jestin Gan

Original Soundtrack by Kazami Shintaro
